content: --व्यंग्यं (in <ab>Rhet.</ab>) the second of the three divisions of Kāvya (poetry), in which the charm of the {%suggested%} sense is not more striking than that of the {%expressed%} one. <ls>S. D.</ls> thus defines it:-- अपरं तु गुणीभूतव्यंग्यं वाच्यादनुत्तमे व्यंग्ये . <ls n="S. D.">265.</ls> This division of Kāvya is further subdivided into 8 classes; see <ls>S. D. 266</ls> and <ls>K. P. 5.</ls>
